caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI`I, Plaintiff-Appellee, vs. HENRY A. ROSS,

opinion.posture: Appeal from the District Court of the Third Circuit, Cr. Nos. 95-338 95-339.
opinion.attorneys: Jon N. Ikenaga, Deputy Public Defender, for defendant-appellant, on the motion.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER DENYING MOTION FOR RECONSIDERATION Upon consideration of defendant-appellant Henry A. Ross's motion for reconsideration, filed June 13, 2000, the papers in support thereof, and the record herein,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration is denied.
